headline: 50T Launches $500M Growth Equity Fund, Consolidates 10T Holdings and 1RoundTable Partners Under New Unified Brand
summary: 10T Holdings (10T) and 1RoundTable Partners (1RT), leading growth equity funds investing in the Digital Asset Ecosystem (DAE), today announced their consolidation under a new unified brand: 50T. The rebrand reflects the organization's projection that the global digital asset ecosystem will reach $50 trillion in total value over the next decade. 50T also today announced the launch of the offering of a new $500 million fund, 50T Fund, a 10-year closed-end fund focused on growth equity investments,

headline: Crypto Whales Drive $4 Trillion Market Revival on Policy Optimism
summary: (Bloomberg) -- A relentless wave of optimism is sweeping the nearly $4 trillion crypto market, driven by a frenzy of Washington policy moves accelerating its assimilation into regulated finance.
